name: Teachable Machine Project
summary: A TM file is a project file created by Google Teachable Machine, an online app used to create machine learning models. It contains a copy of the project's training samples and a JSON manifest file. TM files are renamed .ZIP files, which you can open and extract files from as you would any ZIP file.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

macos.display_name: Rename .tm to .zip ; open with Zip-decompression utility

windows.display_name: Rename .tm to .zip ; open with Zip-decompression utility

images.caption: TM file open in Google Teachable Machine
images.alt: TM file open in Google Teachable Machine
